pages.thanks: Gamelot: Rent games and consoles for incredible adventures Thank You! Thank you for choosing Gamelot for all your gaming needs. We appreciate your business and hope you enjoy our services. What's Next? Now that you've completed your transaction, you can start exploring our vast collection of games and consoles. Whether you're into action, adventure, or strategy games, we have something for everyone. Stay Connected Follow us on social media to stay updated on the latest game releases, promotions, and events. You can also subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive deals and offers. Need Help? If you have any questions or need assistance, don't hesitate to contact our customer support team. We're here to help you every step of the way. Thank you again for choosing Gamelot. Happy gaming! Home

pages.privacy: Privacy Policy - Gamelot Home Game catalog Consoles for rent Contacts Home Game catalog Consoles for rent Contacts Privacy Policy Effective Date: January 1, 2024 This Privacy Policy describes how Gamelot ("we", "our company", or "Gamelot") collects, uses, and discloses information that you ("user" or "you") provide when using our website and related services. Collection and Use of Information We may collect various types of information, including personal data, when you visit our website, register on it, place an order, or subscribe to our newsletter. This information may include your name, email address, shipping address, and payment details. We use the collected information to operate our website, fulfill orders, process payments, provide customer support services, and send you information about our products and promotions. Disclosure of Information to Third Parties We may disclose your information to third parties, including partners, service providers, and agents who assist us in serving our customers and fulfilling orders. We may also disclose information as required by law or in response to legal requests. Protection of Information We take security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of data transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data. Changes to the Privacy Policy We reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will take effect upon publication on our website. We recommend that you periodically review our Privacy Policy to stay informed of its current version. If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@gamelot.com.
